mapper.select: SELECT S.SNACK_NO , S.SNACK_NAME , S.PURCHASE_PRICE , S.CATEGORY_NO , S.DETAIL_NO ,S.TASTE_NO , S.AROMA_NO , A.CHANGE_NAME FROM SNACK S JOIN SNACK_ATTACHMENT A ON (S.SNACK_NO = A.SNACK_NO) WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND CATEGORY_NO = 1 AND DETAIL_NO = #{dtc}
SELECT COUNT(COM_CODE) FROM WISHLIST WHERE COM_CODE = #{comCode} AND STATUS = 'N'
SELECT WISH_NO FROM WISHLIST WHERE COM_CODE = #{comCode} AND STATUS = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE WISHLIST_DETAIL SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE SNACK_NO = #{wishSnackNo}
mapper.select: SELECT S.SNACK_NO , S.SNACK_NAME , S.PURCHASE_PRICE , S.CATEGORY_NO , S.DETAIL_NO ,S.TASTE_NO , S.AROMA_NO , A.CHANGE_NAME FROM SNACK S JOIN SNACK_ATTACHMENT A ON (S.SNACK_NO = A.SNACK_NO) WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND CATEGORY_NO = 2 AND DETAIL_NO = #{dtc}

SELECT S.SNACK_NO , S.SNACK_NAME , S.PURCHASE_PRICE , S.CATEGORY_NO , S.DETAIL_NO ,S.TASTE_NO , S.AROMA_NO , A.CHANGE_NAME FROM SNACK S JOIN SNACK_ATTACHMENT A ON (S.SNACK_NO = A.SNACK_NO) WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND CATEGORY_NO = 3 AND DETAIL_NO = #{dtc}

SELECT C.COM_CODE , D.COM_NAME ,A.WISH_NO, B.CATEGORY_NO, A.SNACK_NO , B.SNACK_NAME , A.COUNT , B.PURCHASE_PRICE , C.WISH_END_DATE , E.CHANGE_NAME FROM WISHLIST_DETAIL A JOIN SNACK B ON (A.SNACK_NO = B.SNACK_NO) JOIN SNACK_ATTACHMENT E ON (B.SNACK_NO = E.SNACK_NO) JOIN WISHLIST C ON (A.WISH_NO = C.WISH_NO) JOIN COMPANY D ON (C.COM_CODE = D.COM_CODE) WHERE C.COM_CODE = #{comCode} AND C.STATUS = 'N'
